page.title: 02PRESTWICH - LAND USE
page.content: {RESIDENTIAL 64%} Prestwich is a suburb and a popular place to live.Therefore there are more houses {RECREATION 19% }The area has a high population and these people need parkland to spend their leisure time {MEDICAL 11%} Prestwich hospital treats mental illness. The patients need a large area to walk around, so it has large grounds {INDUSTRY 2%} There is little room for industry because most of the land is used for houses {COMMERCIAL 2%} There is only one shopping centre;shops do not use up much space as they are clustered together {OPEN WATER 2%} There is one reservoir possibly used for emergency supplies in times of drought
